title: A Relaxing Weekend in the Yard

sentences.english: Plants are amazing!
sentences.chinese: 植物太神奇了！

sentences.english: Within a tiny seed, there is life.
sentences.chinese: 在小小的一颗种子之内，蕴含着生命。

sentences.english: First, the root grows to collect water.
sentences.chinese: 首先，根生长出来以收集水分。

sentences.english: Then, the water travels up the stem to each green leaf.
sentences.chinese: 接着，水分沿着茎传送到每一片绿叶。

sentences.english: This is a natural process.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个自然的过程。

sentences.english: You can think of a leaf as a small workshop.
sentences.chinese: 你可以把叶子想象成一个小型车间。

sentences.english: It takes in sunlight and oxygen comes out!
sentences.chinese: 它吸收阳光，然后释放出氧气！

sentences.english: During the day, the leaves mix water and air to produce sugar.
sentences.chinese: 白天，叶子将水和空气混合来生产糖。

sentences.english: This "food" is the product of their hard work.
sentences.chinese: 这种"食物"就是它们辛勤工作的产品。

sentences.english: Though plants rest when it is dark, they soon rise and grow again when the sun comes up.
sentences.chinese: 虽然在黑暗时植物会休息，但太阳一升起，它们很快就会上升（抬头）并再次生长。

sentences.english: Plants are the key to human health.
sentences.chinese: 植物是人类健康的关键。

sentences.english: We breathe because of them!
sentences.chinese: 因为它们，我们才能呼吸！

sentences.english: Some people prefer to grow rose flowers or bamboo, while others grow cotton or corn.
sentences.chinese: 有些人更喜欢种玫瑰或竹子，而另一些人则种棉花或玉米。

sentences.english: Did you know corn silk is used in some culture?
sentences.chinese: 你知道在某些文化中会用到玉米须吗？

sentences.english: It's no secret that nature is important.
sentences.chinese: 大自然很重要，这早已不是什么秘密了。

sentences.english: This weekend, my husband (an adult who loves nature) and I are in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 这个周末，我和我的丈夫（一个热爱大自然的成年人）在院子里。

sentences.english: We relax and chat about the news.
sentences.chinese: 我们一边放松，一边聊天说些新闻。

sentences.english: We drink coffee and eat a biscuit.
sentences.chinese: 我们喝着咖啡，吃着饼干。

sentences.english: One quarter of our yard is full of flowers.
sentences.chinese: 我们院子的四分之一都种满了花。

sentences.english: It is a great way to connect with nature, just like being in a small rainforest!
sentences.chinese: 这是一个与自然连接的好方法，就像待在一个微型雨林里一样！
